description: Set up the basic structure for TD-Lambda for policy evaluation.

prompts.prompt: Implement the 'td_lambda' function to simulate the TD-Lambda method for policy evaluation. The function does not require specific input parameters or outputs for this task, but it should return a non-null value.

Temporal Difference (TD) methods, especially TD-Lambda, are vital in reinforcement learning for policy evaluation. Your mission is to conceptualize this by crafting a rudimentary function named 'td_lambda'. Although this function doesn't demand any particular inputs and can produce any non-null result for this exercise, the primary intent is to represent the structure of a TD-Lambda method for policy evaluation.
